tips.loading.1: Use a hoe to prepare areas of ground for planting.
tips.loading.2: Feed a bone to a wolf to tame it. You can then make it sit or follow you.
tips.loading.3: Use the right tool for the job!
tips.loading.4: A single bucket of lava can be used in a furnace to smelt 100 blocks.
tips.loading.5: Lava can take minutes to disappear COMPLETELY when the source block is removed.
tips.loading.6: Placing two chests side by side will make one large chest.
tips.loading.7: You can change your game spawn point and skip to dawn by sleeping in a bed.
tips.loading.9: Harvest leather from cows, and use it to make armor.
tips.loading.10: Plant some saplings and they'll grow into trees.
tips.loading.11: Blocks that can be used as a light source will melt snow and ice. This includes torches, glowstone, and Jack-O-Lanterns.
tips.loading.12: Chickens lay an egg every 5 to 10 minutes.
tips.loading.13: Obsidian can only be mined with a diamond pickaxe.
tips.loading.14: Obsidian is created when water hits a lava source block.
tips.loading.15: Creepers are the easiest obtainable source of gunpowder.
tips.loading.16: Don't look an Enderman in the eye!
tips.loading.17: The instrument played by a note block depends on the material beneath it.
tips.loading.19: If you set the game difficulty to Peaceful, your health will automatically regenerate, and no monsters will come out at night!
tips.loading.20: Always assume rumors are false, rather than assuming they're true!
tips.loading.21: There will be an update to this game eventually!
tips.loading.22: Building a portal will allow you to travel to another dimension - The Nether.
tips.loading.23: Read the What's New section in the How to Play menus to see the latest update information about the game.
tips.loading.24: Cook cactus in a furnace to get green dye.
tips.loading.25: Cobblestone is resistant to Ghast fireballs, making it useful for guarding portals.
tips.loading.26: Creepers explode when they get close to you!
tips.loading.27: Digging soil or sand with a spade is faster than with your hand!
tips.loading.28: Take caution when building structures made of wool in open air, as lightning from thunderstorms can set wool on fire.
tips.loading.29: If you can't find any coal for your torches, you can always make charcoal from trees in a furnace.
tips.loading.30: Bonemeal (crafted from a Skeleton bone) can be used as a fertilizer, and can make things grow instantly!
tips.loading.31: Sleeping in a bed at night will fast forward the game to dawn, but all players in a multiplayer game need to sleep in beds at the same time.
tips.loading.32: Spiders won't attack you during the day - unless you attack them.
tips.loading.33: Make some torches to light up areas at night. Monsters will avoid the areas around these torches.
tips.loading.34: If an animal can't move more than 20 blocks in any direction, it won't despawn.
tips.loading.35: Digging straight down or straight up is not a great idea.
tips.loading.36: Creepers were born from a coding bug.
tips.loading.37: Tame wolves show their health with the position of their tail. Feed them meat to heal them.
tips.loading.38: Hit those fireballs back at the Ghast!
tips.loading.39: If you have an empty bucket, you can fill it with milk from a cow, or water, or lava!
tips.loading.40: Is it a chicken or is it a duck?
tips.loading.41: Zombies and Skeletons can survive daylight if they are in water.
tips.loading.42: Attacking a wolf will cause any wolves in the immediate vicinity to turn hostile and attack you. This trait is also shared by Zombie Pigmen.
tips.loading.43: Pigmen won't attack you, unless you attack them.
tips.loading.44: Get to destinations faster with a minecart and rail!
tips.loading.46: Use seagrass to attract and breed sea turtles.
tips.loading.47: Protect baby turtles from hostile mobs!
tips.loading.48: Baby turtles will drop scutes when they grow - these can be crafted into turtle shells.
tips.loading.49: Brew some water breathing potions for underwater exploration!
tips.loading.50: Dolphins can lead you to shipwrecks and underwater ruins, feed them cod and follow their trail!
tips.loading.51: Use shears to carve a pumpkin.
tips.loading.52: Use phantom membranes to repair your elytra.
tips.loading.53: There are 3587 types of tropical fish!
tips.loading.54: Sea pickles can be smelted into lime green dye.
tips.loading.56: Compasses always point to the world spawn - craft one to find your way!
tips.loading.57: Trade with villagers to obtain food, tools, and even treasure maps!
tips.loading.58: Did you know you can hold a map in your off-hand?
tips.loading.59: Sneak or wear frost walker boots to walk safely on magma blocks.
tips.loading.60: You can gather cob webs using shears.
tips.loading.61: Before you mine diamonds, redstone or gold, make sure you're using an iron or diamond pickaxe or the ore won't drop.
tips.loading.62: Gold is more abundant in Mesa biomes!
tips.loading.63: Elytra can be used to glide, find them in End City ships!
tips.loading.64: Tridents are dropped by the Drowned, and can be held or thrown.
tips.loading.65: You can smelt 20 items in a furnace by using a block of dried kelp as fuel.
tips.loading.66: Creepers that are killed by skeletons' arrows have a chance of dropping music discs.
tips.loading.67: Emerald ores are the rarest ores in Minecraft! They can only be found in extreme hill biomes!
tips.loading.68: Phantoms are dangerous mobs that appear during the night. Make sure to sleep regularly!
tips.loading.69: Zombies turn into drowned if they sink underwater.
tips.loading.70: MINECON takes place every year! Look out for the next one!
tips.loading.71: Using fireworks boosts elytra speed in mid air. Just... make sure they don't explode, otherwise it'll hurt BADLY!
tips.loading.73: MINECON Earth is a worldwide interactive live-streaming event. Grab your items and join the party!
tips.loading.74: The Beacon is a powerful item that can only be crafted with a nether star from the Wither!
tips.loading.75: Did you know that nether stars can't be destroyed by explosions?
tips.loading.76: When digging straight up, place a torch at your feet to break any sand or gravel that could potentially fall down on you.
tips.loading.77: If you're playing on a console, you can connect extra controllers and press START on them to join a game at any point.
tips.loading.78: Alter the brightness settings to make the game brighter or darker.
tips.loading.80: No-one can remember where Minecon 2014 was held.
tips.loading.81: Minecon 2011 was in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA!
tips.loading.83: Minecon 2013 was in Orlando, Florida, USA!
tips.loading.85: Minecon 2016 was in Anaheim, California, USA!
